hero_power.description: Roll a 6-sided die. Gain that much Gold. (Cannot be used again for that many turns!)

warband.name: Patient Scout
warband.description: When you sell this, Discover two Tier 1 minions. (Upgrades each turn!)

tavern_entities.description: Battlecry: The next Tavern spell you buy costs (1) less.
